Mob
  • Home
  • Getting started
  • CSS
  • Components
  • JavaScript

CSS

基础布局和CSS样式

页面布局

Page Container

page 用来显示一个满屏页面的架子.

<section class="page"> ... </section>

也可用div元素实现

<div class="page"> ... </div>

Topbar

top bar 为页面顶部的工具栏, 有随页面固定和随页面滚动两种。要注意其与 Header 的区别

<div class="toolbar">
    <span class="icon-list">
    <span class="title">TOOLBAR</span>
    <span class="icon-cog"></span>
</div>

Header

header 为页面头部通栏封面或广告。例子: examples/audio-player.html

<div class="page-header page-header-cover">
</div>

Content

page-content 用来表示page中navbar, topbar,aside以外的主要内容。page-content 会自动进行垂直布局。 例子: examples/audio-player.html

<div class="page-content"></div>

Aside

Aside 是侧边栏。Mob 支持两种形式的侧边栏。一个是进入时覆盖的侧边栏，一个是进入时推原来页面的侧边栏

默认侧边栏:

<aside class="aside aside-right">

进入时push的侧边栏:

<aside class="aside aside-push aside-right" data-bind='.page'>

Bottombar

Bottombar是底部导航栏

<div class='navbar bottombar bottombar-fixed'>

Tables

普通表格

<table class="table">
    <tr>
        <th> TH1 </th><th> TH2 </th><th> TH3 </th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td> TD1 </td><td> TD2 </td><td> TD3 </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td> TD1 </td><td> TD2 </td><td> TD3 </td>
    </tr>
</table>

有边框的表格

<table class="table-bordered">
    <tr>
        <th> TH1 </th><th> TH2 </th><th> TH3 </th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td> TD1 </td><td> TD2 </td><td> TD3 </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td> TD1 </td><td> TD2 </td><td> TD3 </td>
    </tr>
</table>

有背景颜色条的表格

<table class="table-striped">
    <tr>
        <th> TH1 </th><th> TH2 </th><th> TH3 </th>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td> TD1 </td><td> TD2 </td><td> TD3 </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
        <td> TD1 </td><td> TD2 </td><td> TD3 </td>
    </tr>
</table>

Grids (九宫格)

Grids 为九宫格自动排版的组件

<div class="grids">
    <div class="grids-row">
        <div class="grids-grid"> First Grid</div>
        <div class="grids-grid"> Second Grid</div>
        <div class="grids-grid"> Third Grid</div>
    </div>
    <div class="grids-row">
        <div class="grids-grid"> Forth Grid</div>
        <div class="grids-grid"> Fiveth Grid</div>
        <div class="grids-grid"> Sixth Grid</div>
    </div>
    <div class="grids-row">
        <div class="grids-grid"> Seventh Grid</div>
        <div class="grids-grid"> Eighth Grid</div>
        <div class="grids-grid"> Nighth Grid</div>
    </div>
</div>

Buttons

默认 button:

<button type="button" class="btn btn-default">button</button>

圆按钮(Circle button):

<div class="btn btn-circle">circle</div>

方形按钮(Square button):

<div class="btn btn-square">square</div>

按钮大小(Sizes)

<button type="button" class="btn btn-default btn-lg btn-block">Block level button</button>

按钮状态(Active state)

<button type="button" class="btn btn-default btn-lg active">Button</button>

Tips / Alert

提示

<div class="alert">This is a tips.</div>

Images

图标装饰效果

<img class="img-circle" src="img/list-icon-1.jpg">
<img class="img-rounded" src="img/list-icon-1.jpg">
<img class="img-polaroid" src="img/list-icon-1.jpg">

Helper classes

工具类

Close icon

关闭按钮图标

<button type="button" class="close" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>

Carets

插入记号

<span class="caret"></span>

Quick floats

快速浮动

<div class="pull-left">...</div>
<div class="pull-right">...</div>

Clearfix

清除浮动

<div class="clearfix">...</div>

Showing and hiding content

显示和隐藏内容

<div class="show">...</div>
<div class="hidden">...</div>

Blocks

块状内容

<div class="panel panel-default">
  <div class="panel-body">
    Basic panel example
  </div>
</div>

Badge

徽章样式

<span class="badge">read</span>
